main.title: 2280E Edge Server
main.text: The 2280E edge model is specially designed for edge computing scenarios such as multi-access edge computing (MEC), content delivery network (CDN), cloud gaming, cloud phone, smart campus, and video surveillance. It meets the Edge Computing IT Infrastructure (ECII) and Open Telecom IT Infrastructure (OTII) standards for edge servers.
bottomTip1: Move the mouse to rotate the model
bottomTip2: Move the mouse to move the model
bottomTip3: Move the mouse to zoom in or out the model
disk_spot: Up to 10 x 2.5'' SAS/SATA/SSD drives, or 8 x 2.5'' NVMe SSDs.
